dialogues.speaker: system
dialogues.text_en: Liliana's hairpin glows faintly.

dialogues.speaker: protagonist
dialogues.text_en: This is it... The Abyss of Memory.
You've come. Finally.

dialogues.speaker: protagonist
dialogues.text: 넌 누구야? 계속 날 인도했던 목소리...
dialogues.text_en: Who are you? The voice that's been guiding me...
You'll know soon. At the end of the abyss.

dialogues.text: 하지만 먼저... 네 자신을 마주해야 해.
dialogues.text_en: But first... you must face yourself.

environment_memories.visual: 어린 아이가 비를 맞으며 울고 있다
environment_memories.text_en: Parents... I never had them. From the start.
I had to become strong. To protect someone.
"Why are you crying?" "Because I'm going to die soon."
"I will protect you. No matter what."
We were happy. Brief... but it felt like eternity.

environment_memories.visual: 고서를 읽는 두 사람, 절망하는 표정
environment_memories.text_en: "On my 22nd birthday... the world will end."
"Kill me. Please. It's the only way."

extra_memory.text: 부모님은... 날 지키려다 죽었다. 그것도 내 탓이야.
extra_memory.text_en: My parents... died protecting me. That was my fault too.

dialogues.speaker: system
dialogues.text: 사방이 거울이다. 무수한 자신의 모습이 보인다.
dialogues.text_en: Mirrors everywhere. Countless reflections of yourself.

dialogues.speaker: past_self
dialogues.text_en: It's been a while... or is this our first meeting?

dialogues.speaker: protagonist
dialogues.text_en: ...Me? But different. Your eyes...

dialogues.speaker: past_self
dialogues.text: 아직 빛이 있지? 난 네가 기억하지 못하는 '나'야.
dialogues.text_en: Still have light in them, right? I'm the 'you' that you don't remember.

dialogues.speaker: past_self
dialogues.text_en: Arion. That's our name. Do you remember?

dialogues.speaker: protagonist
dialogues.text_en: Arion... Yes, that's right. My name is...

dialogues.speaker: past_self
dialogues.text_en: Liliana gave you that name. It means 'the radiant one.'

dialogues.speaker: past_self
dialogues.text: 웃기지? 빛나는 자가 어둠 속에서 헤매고 있으니.
dialogues.text_en: Ironic, isn't it? The radiant one, wandering in darkness.

dialogues.speaker: past_self
dialogues.text: 하지만 괜찮아. 넌 다시 빛날 수 있어.
dialogues.text_en: But it's okay. You can shine again.

dialogues.speaker: past_self
dialogues.text_en: When you save her.

sequence.text_en: The memory of that day is recreated.

sequence.text: 달빛 아래 정원. 리리아나가 검을 건네고 있다.
sequence.text_en: The garden under moonlight. Liliana offers a sword.

sequence.speaker: memory_liliana
sequence.text: 저주가 깨어나고 있어. 내가... 내가 아닌 것이 되어가고 있어.
sequence.text_en: The curse is awakening. I'm... becoming something that isn't me.

sequence.speaker: memory_arion
sequence.text_en: There must be another way. There has to be...

sequence.speaker: memory_liliana
sequence.text: 없어. 수천 년 동안 찾았지만... 없었어.
sequence.text_en: There isn't. They searched for thousands of years... There was nothing.

sequence.speaker: memory_liliana
sequence.text: 나로 죽게 해줘. 괴물이 아니라... 리리아나로.
sequence.text_en: Let me die as myself. Not as a monster... but as Liliana.

if_refuse.text: 리리아나의 눈이 검게 물들고 있다. 저주가 깨어나고 있다.
if_refuse.text_en: Liliana's eyes are turning black. The curse is awakening.

final_sequence.text_en: ...In the end, you raised the sword.

final_sequence.speaker: protagonist
final_sequence.text: 어떤 결정을 해도... 결국 같은 결말이었어.
final_sequence.text_en: No matter what I decided... the ending was the same.

dialogues.speaker: system
dialogues.text: 하얀 빛으로 가득한 공간. 중앙에 후드를 쓴 인물이 서있다.
dialogues.text_en: A space filled with white light. A hooded figure stands in the center.
...You've finally made it here.

dialogues.speaker: protagonist
dialogues.text_en: Tell me now. Who are you?
...Alright. There's no need to hide anymore.
[Removes the hood]

dialogues.speaker: system
dialogues.text: ...주인공과 같은 얼굴. 하지만 더 지치고, 더 늙은.
dialogues.text_en: ...The same face as the protagonist. But more weary, more aged.

dialogues.speaker: future_self
dialogues.text_en: I'm 'Arion'. The one you almost became.

dialogues.speaker: future_self
dialogues.text: 다른 시간선에서 온 나. 리리아나를 구하지 못한 나.
dialogues.text_en: Me from another timeline. The me who failed to save Liliana.

dialogues.speaker: protagonist
dialogues.text_en: Another timeline...? Is that even possible?

dialogues.speaker: future_self
dialogues.text: 세 개의 심장. 그게 가능하게 했어.
dialogues.text_en: The Three Hearts. They made it possible.

dialogues.speaker: future_self
dialogues.text: 세 개의 심장을 모으지 못했어. 그래서 실패했지.
dialogues.text_en: I couldn't gather the Three Hearts. That's why I failed.

dialogues.speaker: future_self
dialogues.text: 내가 여기서 널 인도한 건... 같은 실수를 막기 위해서야.
dialogues.text_en: I've been guiding you here... to prevent the same mistake.

three_hearts_explanation.speaker: future_self
three_hearts_explanation.text: 세 개의 심장. 그 의미를 알려줄게.
three_hearts_explanation.text_en: The Three Hearts. Let me tell you their meaning.

three_hearts_explanation.speaker: future_self
three_hearts_explanation.text: 첫 번째 심장 - 과거의 심장. 리리아나와의 기억이 담긴 심장.
three_hearts_explanation.text_en: The First Heart - Heart of the Past. The heart containing memories with Liliana.

three_hearts_explanation.speaker: future_self
three_hearts_explanation.text: 넌 이미 가지고 있어. 피의 정원에서 기억을 되찾았으니까.
three_hearts_explanation.text_en: You already have it. You recovered your memories in the Garden of Blood.

three_hearts_explanation.speaker: future_self
three_hearts_explanation.text: 두 번째 심장 - 현재의 심장. 네 자신을 받아들이는 심장.
three_hearts_explanation.text_en: The Second Heart - Heart of the Present. The heart of accepting yourself.

three_hearts_explanation.speaker: future_self
three_hearts_explanation.text: 살인자인 자신을 부정하면 안 돼. 그것도 '너'니까.
three_hearts_explanation.text_en: You cannot deny the murderer within. Because that is also 'you'.

three_hearts_explanation.speaker: future_self
three_hearts_explanation.text: 세 번째 심장 - 미래의 심장. 리리아나를 구하겠다는 의지.
three_hearts_explanation.text_en: The Third Heart - Heart of the Future. The will to save Liliana.

three_hearts_explanation.speaker: future_self
three_hearts_explanation.text: 망각의 옥좌에서 증명해야 해. 어떤 대가를 치르더라도.
three_hearts_explanation.text_en: You must prove it at the Throne of Oblivion. No matter the cost.

salvation_method.speaker: future_self
salvation_method.text: 망각의 옥좌. 세계의 끝에 있는 곳.
salvation_method.text_en: The Throne of Oblivion. At the end of the world.

salvation_method.speaker: future_self
salvation_method.text_en: The place where the world sealed her by 'forgetting' her.

salvation_method.speaker: future_self
salvation_method.text: 세 개의 심장으로 봉인을 풀 수 있어.
salvation_method.text_en: The Three Hearts can break the seal.

salvation_method.speaker: future_self
salvation_method.text: 세계가 무언가를 잊어야 해. 그녀 대신.
salvation_method.text_en: The world must forget something. In her place.

salvation_method.speaker: future_self
salvation_method.text_en: ...I offered myself as the price, but it wasn't enough.

salvation_method.speaker: future_self
salvation_method.text: 넌 더 나은 방법을 찾아. 반드시.
salvation_method.text_en: You must find a better way. You must.

dialogues.speaker: system
dialogues.text: 완전한 어둠. 그 속에서 무언가가 다가온다.
dialogues.text_en: Complete darkness. Something approaches from within.

dialogues.speaker: system
dialogues.text: ...자신의 모습. 하지만 온몸이 검은 안개로 이루어져 있다.
dialogues.text_en: ...Your own form. But made entirely of black mist.

dialogues.speaker: shadow_self
dialogues.text_en: You're here again. Trying to run again?

dialogues.speaker: protagonist
dialogues.text_en: ...What are you?

dialogues.speaker: shadow_self
dialogues.text_en: I'm the you that you refuse to acknowledge.

dialogues.speaker: shadow_self
dialogues.text_en: Murderer. Traitor. Coward.

dialogues.speaker: shadow_self
dialogues.text: 리리아나를 죽인 손. 그게 바로 너야.
dialogues.text_en: The hands that killed Liliana. That's you.

dialogues.speaker: protagonist
dialogues.text_en: That was... I had no choice!

dialogues.speaker: shadow_self
dialogues.text_en: Haha... Still saying that?

dialogues.speaker: shadow_self
dialogues.text_en: Then prove it. That you're a 'hero'.

battle_dialogues.speaker: shadow_self
battle_dialogues.text_en: You say I'm not you? Don't make me laugh.

battle_dialogues.speaker: shadow_self
battle_dialogues.text: 네가 강할수록 나도 강해. 우린 하나니까.
battle_dialogues.text_en: The stronger you are, the stronger I am. Because we are one.

phase_2.mechanic: 플레이어가 쓸 수 없는 어둠 기술

battle_dialogues.speaker: shadow_self
battle_dialogues.text_en: Admit it! You WANTED to kill her!

battle_dialogues.speaker: shadow_self
battle_dialogues.text: 저주 때문이 아니야. 네가 약해서 죽인 거야!
battle_dialogues.text_en: It wasn't because of the curse. You killed her because you were weak!

battle_dialogues.speaker: shadow_self
battle_dialogues.text: 구한다고? 웃기지 마. 또 죽일 거잖아.
battle_dialogues.text_en: Save her? Don't make me laugh. You'll just kill her again.

extra_dialogue.speaker: shadow_self
extra_dialogue.text: 봐. 인간성마저 잃어가고 있잖아. 넌 이미 괴물이야.
extra_dialogue.text_en: Look. You're even losing your humanity. You're already a monster.

phase_3.mechanic: 공격이 점점 약해짐. 접근 시 통합

battle_dialogues.speaker: shadow_self
battle_dialogues.text_en: Even if you kill me, you won't be complete.

battle_dialogues.speaker: shadow_self
battle_dialogues.text: 난... 네 일부야. 네 슬픔. 네 죄책감.
battle_dialogues.text_en: I'm... part of you. Your sorrow. Your guilt.

battle_dialogues.speaker: shadow_self
battle_dialogues.text_en: ...Only then can you truly save Liliana.

options.note: 플레이어가 공격을 멈추고 다가가면 통합 컷씬

dialogues.speaker: protagonist
dialogues.text_en: ...I understand.

dialogues.speaker: protagonist
dialogues.text_en: You are me.

dialogues.speaker: protagonist
dialogues.text: 살인자인 나. 겁쟁이인 나. 약한 나.
dialogues.text_en: The murderer me. The coward me. The weak me.

dialogues.speaker: protagonist
dialogues.text_en: But even so...

dialogues.speaker: protagonist
dialogues.text_en: The me who loved Liliana.

dialogues.speaker: shadow_self
dialogues.text_en: ...Yes. That's everything. That's 'us'.
[The shadow transforms into light and merges with the protagonist]

dialogues.speaker: system
dialogues.text: 두 번째 심장 - 현재의 심장을 획득했다.
dialogues.text_en: You have obtained the Second Heart - Heart of the Present.

dialogues.speaker: protagonist
dialogues.text_en: Now I understand. The Three Hearts.

dialogues.speaker: protagonist
dialogues.text: 과거를 기억하는 심장. 현재를 받아들이는 심장.
dialogues.text_en: The heart that remembers the past. The heart that accepts the present.

dialogues.speaker: protagonist
dialogues.text_en: And... the heart that chooses the future.

dialogues.speaker: future_self
dialogues.text_en: ...Well done.

dialogues.speaker: future_self
dialogues.text: 난 그걸 하지 못했거든. 끝까지 나 자신을 부정했어.
dialogues.text_en: I couldn't do that. I denied myself until the end.

dialogues.speaker: protagonist
dialogues.text_en: ...What happens to you now?

dialogues.speaker: future_self
dialogues.text: 사라지겠지. 네가 나와 다른 길을 갈 테니까.
dialogues.text_en: I'll disappear. Since you'll walk a different path from mine.

dialogues.speaker: future_self
dialogues.text: 이제 갈 수 있어. 망각의 옥좌로. 리리아나에게로.
dialogues.text_en: Now you can go. To the Throne of Oblivion. To Liliana.

dialogues.speaker: future_self
dialogues.text: 대가에 대해서... 더 나은 방법을 찾길 바라.
dialogues.text_en: About the price... I hope you find a better way.
[The future Arion scatters into particles of light]

dialogues.speaker: future_self
dialogues.text_en: ...In the next life, may you be happy with her.

dialogues.speaker: protagonist
dialogues.text_en: Let's go. This time, to truly save her.

dialogues.speaker: system
dialogues.text: 심연이 길을 연다. 그 끝에 망각의 옥좌가 기다린다.
dialogues.text_en: The abyss opens a path. The Throne of Oblivion awaits at its end.

chapter_end_text.kr:
Chapter 5 - 기억의 심연 [완료]

"나는 아리온. 빛나는 자.
살인자이자, 사랑하는 자.
그리고... 구원자가 될 자."

To be continued in Chapter 6: 망각의 옥좌
chapter_end_text.en:
Chapter 5 - The Abyss of Memory [Complete]

"I am Arion. The Radiant One.
A murderer, and one who loved.
And... one who will become a savior."

To be continued in Chapter 6: The Throne of Oblivion
